snippet: New York's Metropolitan Opera is bracing for its most tumultuous opening in decades on Monday as protesters get ready to picket "The Death of Klinghoffer," the John Adams opera about the 1985 hijacking of a cruise ship by Palestinian guerillas....

headline.print_headline: New York's Met Opera Braces for 'Death of Klinghoffer' Protests
headline.main: New York's Met Opera Braces for 'Death of Klinghoffer' Protests

lead_paragraph: New York's Metropolitan Opera is bracing for its most tumultuous opening in decades on Monday as protesters get ready to picket "The Death of Klinghoffer," the John Adams opera about the 1985 hijacking of a cruise ship by Palestinian guerillas.
